item.title: Voice AI Startup Mappa Reinvents How Teams Hire
item.description: Mappa uses voice AI to analyze speech patterns and predict team fit, redefining how companies hire with behavioral intelligence.

item.title: Samsung Finally Unveils Galaxy TriFold And Confirms Release Date
item.description: The three-screen Samsung Galaxy folder has now been unveiled in South Korea. Here’s what was revealed.

item.title: Mattel Debuts New Hot Wheels Racing Game Exclusive To BMW’s AirConsole
item.description: Now you can race hot wheels cars while you're sitting in your car but not driving your car, if you really like cars.

item.title: When To Turn Clocks Back This Weekend As Daylight Saving Time Ends
item.description: Daylight Saving Time ends in North America on Sunday, Nov. 2, at 2 a.m. Here’s when to “fall back” and what really changes.

item.title: Update Now As Microsoft Confirms New Windows Admin Protection
item.description: Microsoft adds new protections for Windows users to prevent malicious applications and actors from attacking your account. Here’s what you need to kno...
